projects.title: AirEvr
projects.description: Web application that addresses issues with electric vehicles by offering a variety of alternatives, like purchasing portable chargers and using Google Maps api to display local charging stations while keeping database records of all users and suppliers.

projects.title: RENT IT OUT E-COMMERCE WEBSITE
projects.description: Rent it out, is an online shopping cart application.You can rent any furniture you want, anywhere you want for any time period. This is a geniune and native application to which you can rely on, specially when you want to get it done quickly. It comprises of many screens with different features to make the navigate smooth & user-friendly. All the code used, are well organized and layered to make the development precise event for a naive user. Code which is being used to model the application is composed of today's trend.
